from pyspark.sql import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
# from Mapplets import Mapplets
from pyspark import SparkContext;
from pyspark.sql.session import SparkSession

Src_AccountURL = 'etlmigpocadls' 
Src_Container = 'etlmigpocdatalake' 
Src_Path = '_StaleFiles' 

Src_URL = 'abfss://{0}@{1}.dfs.core.windows.net/{2}/GLOBAL_CONFIG.parquet'.format(Src_Container, Src_AccountURL, Src_Path) 
Tgt_URL = 'abfss://{0}@{1}.dfs.core.windows.net/{2}/data/Integration/File19/'.format(Src_Container, Src_AccountURL, Src_Path)

SQ_GLOBAL_CONFIG = spark.read.format('parquet').load(Src_URL)
SQ_GLOBAL_CONFIG.show() 
 
FLTR_ROW_REJECT = SQ_GLOBAL_CONFIG.filter(lower(SQ_GLOBAL_CONFIG[SUCCESS_EMAILID]) == false) 
FLTR_ROW_REJECT.show() 
 
FLTR_ROW_REJECT.write.format(delta).mode(overwrite).save(Tgt_URL)

import os; 
from pyspark.sql import * 
from pyspark.sql.functions import * 
from pyspark import SparkContext; 
from pyspark.sql.session import SparkSession
Src_URL = 'abfss://{0}@{1}.dfs.core.windows.net/{2}/GLOBAL_CONFIG.parquet'.format(Src_Container, Src_AccountURL, Src_Path) 
Tgt_URL = 'abfss://{0}@{1}.dfs.core.windows.net/{2}/data/Integration/File19/'.format(Src_Container, Src_AccountURL, Src_Path) 
SQ_GLOBAL_CONFIG = spark.read.format('parquet').load(Src_URL) 
SQ_GLOBAL_CONFIG.show() 
FLTR_ROW_REJECT = SQ_GLOBAL_CONFIG.filter(lower(SQ_GLOBAL_CONFIG[SUCCESS_EMAILID]) == false) 
FLTR_ROW_REJECT.show() 
FLTR_ROW_REJECT.write.format(delta).mode(overwrite).save(Tgt_URL)

import os; from pyspark.sql import *; from pyspark.sql.functions import *; from pyspark import SparkContext; from pyspark.sql.session import SparkSession; Src_AccountURL = 'etlmigpocadls'; Src_Container = 'etlmigpocdatalake'; Src_Path = '_StaleFiles'; Src_URL = 'abfss://{0}@{1}.dfs.core.windows.net/{2}/GLOBAL_CONFIG.parquet'.format(Src_Container, Src_AccountURL, Src_Path); Tgt_URL = 'abfss://{0}@{1}.dfs.core.windows.net/{2}/data/Integration/File19/'.format(Src_Container, Src_AccountURL, Src_Path); SQ_GLOBAL_CONFIG = spark.read.format('parquet').load(Src_URL); SQ_GLOBAL_CONFIG.show(); FLTR_ROW_REJECT = SQ_GLOBAL_CONFIG.filter(lower(SQ_GLOBAL_CONFIG[SUCCESS_EMAILID]) == false); FLTR_ROW_REJECT.show(); FLTR_ROW_REJECT.write.format(delta).mode(overwrite).save(Tgt_URL);
